name: British Trout Association
membership:
Federation of European Aquaculture Producers
Aquaculture Advisory Council
goal: To represent British trout farmers in relations with regulators and government.
interests: Consumers, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Single market
euInitiatives: Medicated feed, Veterinary Medicines, sustainable development of aquaculture, habitats directive.
